data.name: Scale Track
data.desc: Improve existing projects and get judged based on the level of improvements made.

data.name: Veteran Track
data.desc: Submit a technically complex and impressive project as a hackathon-veteran.

data.name: Rookie Track
data.desc: For beginner developers that have only gone to two hackathons or less.

data.name: Solo Track
data.desc: For Solo developers since making a project by yourself is tough, but rewarding!

data.name: Relay Track
data.desc: Compete with other teams on a time-based, relay code track. Only one person can code at a time.

data.name: Idea Track
data.desc: Submit only a design prototype and idea to get judged. No coding necessary!
